code: import{ALERT,WALLET}from"../../constants";import axios from"@helpers/axios/private.axios";export const fiatWithdrawal=_ref=>{let{amount,bank_account,id}=_ref;return async dispatch=>{try{const resp=await axios.post("/gateway/".concat(id,"/request"),{amount,bank_account});console.log(resp.data.data);dispatch({type:WALLET.SHOW_WITHDRAWAL,payload:resp.data.data});return resp;}catch(error){console.error(error);dispatch({type:ALERT.ALERT_ERROR,payload:error.response.data.message});}};};export const cryptoWithdrawal=_ref2=>{let{amount,bank_account,id}=_ref2;return async dispatch=>{console.log(cryptoWithdrawal);try{const resp=await axios.post("/gateway/".concat(id,"/request"),{amount,bank_account});dispatch({type:WALLET.SHOW_WITHDRAWAL,payload:resp.data.data});return resp;}catch(error){console.error(error);dispatch({type:ALERT.ALERT_ERROR,payload:error.response.data.message});}};};export const confirmWithdrawal=_ref3=>{let{code,id}=_ref3;return async dispatch=>{console.log(id);const resp=await axios.post("/gateway/transaction/".concat(id,"/verify"),{code});dispatch({type:WALLET.HIDE_WITHDRAWAL});dispatch({type:ALERT.ALERT_SUCCESS,payload:resp.data.message});return resp;};};
